head.title: unit-no-unknown
head.description:
unit-no-unknown

Disallow unknown units.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

The following patterns are not considered…

body:
#unit-no-unknown

Disallow unknown units.

a { width: 100pixels; }
/**           ↑
 *  These units */

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a {
  width: 10pixels;
}
a {
  width: calc(10px + 10pixels);
}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a {
  width: 10px;
}  
a {
  width: 10Px;
}  
a {
  width: 10pX;
}  
a {
  width: calc(10px + 10px);
}

#Optional options

#ignoreUnits: ["array", "of", "units"]

Allow unknown units.

For example, given:

["pixels"]

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a {
  width: 10pix;
}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a {
  width: 10px;
}
a {
  width: 10pixels;
}
